languages.text: "Теперь ты знаешь о масштабе проблемы — действуй".

traits.locale_text: "Теперь ты знаешь о масштабе проблемы — действуй".

languages.text: "Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."
languages.original_text: "Теперь ты знаешь о масштабе проблемы — действуй".

traits.locale_text: "Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."
"Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."
"Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."
"Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."
"Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."
"Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."
"Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."

languages.text: « Maintenant que vous savez à quoi vous en tenir, faites-le nécessaire pour éliminer la menace. »
languages.original_text: "Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que vous savez à quoi vous en tenir, faites-le nécessaire pour éliminer la menace. »

languages.text: «Por fin lo entiende. Acabe con esta amenaza».
languages.original_text: "Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."

traits.locale_text: «Por fin lo entiende. Acabe con esta amenaza».

languages.text: 「これで全体図が見えただろう。この脅威に対処しろ」
languages.original_text: "Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."

traits.locale_text: 「これで全体図が見えただろう。この脅威に対処しろ」

languages.text: “既然来龙去脉你都清楚了，去解决掉这个威胁吧。”
languages.original_text: "Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."

traits.locale_text: “既然来龙去脉你都清楚了，去解决掉这个威胁吧。”

languages.text: "Jetzt seht Ihr das Gesamtbild. Kümmert Euch um diese Bedrohung."
languages.original_text: "Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."

traits.locale_text: "Jetzt seht Ihr das Gesamtbild. Kümmert Euch um diese Bedrohung."

languages.text: "Şimdi büyük resmi gördün işte. Bu illetin üstesinden gel."
languages.original_text: "Now you see the whole picture. Deal with this menace."
